sentence.Network_en: She disembarrassed an old gentlemen of an empty cup at the teaparty.
sentence.Network_cn: 在茶会上,她使一位老先生免受杯中空空的窘境.

PerfectNetExp.abs: we are going to hold a teaparty tomorrow ., 我们准备在明天开一个茶话会.
茶会(TeaParty) 茶会是一种简便的招待形式。举行的时间一般在下午四时左右(亦有上午十时举行)。茶会通常设在客厅,不用餐厅。厅内设茶几、座椅。不排席位,但如是.
teaoil 茶树油, teaparty 早场演出, teaoil 茶籽油

auth_sentence.content: Even brains might be counter-adaptive, which leads to questions of the survival uses of teaparty thinking.
